fb0ff13bce11026bf5a72b4dec407081164437d6.message: A security scan detected use of a potentially unsafe method to execute a command. If user controlled input is passed to the exec.Command() function, an attacker may be able to inject code that will execute in the underlying server's system shell, resulting in total compromise of the application and possibly other applications running in the same environment.
9a7b6cbee6ed6afe220f1574e2bae48ea806fb58.reason: The user controlled argument is not located in a way to allow code injection with exec.Command. If injection is possible the command would be running with the same privileges in the same environment as the user that injected the code.
